text: I yesli Allakh Vsevyshniy daruyet nadel i opredelyayet yego razmer, otdavay rodstvenniku yego udel iz sostradaniya, dobroty i svyazey, tochno tak zhe davay dolyu - zakyat i milostynyu - nuzhdayushchemusya i putniku. Eto - luchshe dlya tekh, kto zhelayet blagovoleniya Allakha i stremitsya poluchit' Yego nagrazhdeniye. Eto - te, kotoryye budut schastlivy, vechno prebyvaya v rayskikh sadakh
